p: Various procedures have been proposed for preparation of the antimicrobial coating: Spreading with a thin-layer chromatography applicator [ 5] or a lab bench coater [ 7]; using a bar coater [ 15] or a brush [ 16]; spraying (nebulization) [ 17]; lamination [ 18]; gravure printing [ 9]; dip-coating [ 19]; and translated, at industrial scale, by coupling with a wet-coating station and roll-to-roll system [ 20].
